text: Several conflicts in Vietnamese history have been considered civil wars. These are all major conflicts that occurred between North and South Vietnam: *The 12 Lords Rebellion (966-968) [Victory: North Vietnam] *Lê-Mạc War (1533-1592) [Victory: South Vietnam] *Trịnh-Nguyễn War (1627-1672; 1774-1775) [Victory: North Vietnam] *Tây Sơn-Nguyễn Lords War (1771-1785; 1787-1802) [Victory: North Vietnam] *Tây Sơn-Trịnh Lords War (1786-1789) [Victory: South Vietnam]
title: Vietnamese Civil War
